snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown asked federal judges to lift a court order for more releases of state prisoners to reduce overcrowding, saying that such a move could harm public safety.
abstract: Gov Jerry Brown of California asks federal judges to lift court order for more releases of state prisoners to reduce overcrowding, saying move could harm public safety.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown asked federal judges to lift a court order for more releases of state prisoners to reduce overcrowding, saying that such a move could harm public safety.

headline.main: California: Governor Asks Judges to Lift Order on Reducing Prison Population
headline.print_headline:
California: Governor Asks Judges to Lift
Order on Reducing Prison Population
